bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Frank F. Law, March 29, 1948

div1.p: Hench thanks Law for allowing the exhibition of Cornwell's painting at the Fourth International Congress of Tropical Medicine.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Frank F. Law, March 29, 1948
div1.opener:
March 29, 1948
Mr. Frank Law
Wyeth Incorporated
1600 Arch Street
Philadelphia 3, Pennsylvania
My dear Mr. Law:
div1.p:
Thank you so much for your letter of
March 29, and the carbon copy of your letter
to Colonel Dart. If they don't accept your
generous offer to exhibit the Cornwell painting,
they ought to have their heads examined.
div1.closer: Sincerely, P. S. Hench, M. D. PSH:alc
